availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas J. Lampkin (LaRue County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace)

body.p: LaRue County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married to Eliza J. Lampkin. Father of William A. Lampkin, Mary E. Lampkin, and R. A. Lampkin. Farmer in LaRue County in 1850 and 1860. Justice of the peace for the 4th District of LaRue County in 1865.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Larue County, Hamiltons, p. 79; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, LaRue County, p. 55; KYR-0001-007-0386.
